availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: A Kentucky clerk. Married to Mary W. Nisbet. Worked as a clerk in a Muhlenberg County, Kentucky store in 1860. Registered for the draft in Muhlenberg County, Kentucky in 1863.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, p. 65; Civil War Draft Registration Records, 1863-1865, Kentucky, Muhlenberg, p. 32; "Francis Marion Nisbet," (https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=32362615&ref=acom) (accessed on March 23, 2017).
